modules.name: Tutorial

parable.title: Welcome to Parable Bloom
parable.content: They are like a tree planted by streams of water, which yields its fruit in season and whose leaf does not wither whatever they do prospers.
parable.reflection: Just as a tree grows strong by the water, may your faith grow deep roots and bear good fruit.

modules.unlock_message: Tutorial complete! Now let's begin your parable journey.

modules.name: The Mustard Seed

parable.title: The Parable of the Mustard Seed
parable.content: He told them another parable: 'The kingdom of heaven is like a mustard seed, which a man took and planted in his field. Though it is the smallest of all seeds, yet when it grows, it is the largest of garden plants and becomes a tree, so that the birds come and perch in its branches.'
parable.reflection: How does God use small beginnings to create great things in your life?

modules.unlock_message: Module complete! Take time to reflect on the parable.
